amendment.description: An amendment No. 7 printed in House Report 113-455 to add a Sense of Congress establishing that national security is the top priority for the federal government and should be the top priority for the use of public lands.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 7 printed in House Report 113-455 to add a Sense of Congress establishing that national security is the top priority for the federal government and should be the top priority for the use of public lands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
